img_summary: The image depicts a character named "Black Loong" from a video game. The character appears to be a large, muscular creature with a fierce expression, surrounded by a stormy atmosphere with lightning effects. The image includes stylized text in both English and another language, possibly Japanese or Chinese, which is positioned on the left side of the image. The scene conveys a sense of power and intensity.
